title: Watch DEFTONES Debut Their Cover Of JAPAN's "Ghosts" Live
description: Plus "Lhabia", "Beauty School", and "Hexagram" for the first time since 2018.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 8 hours ago
excerpt: Plus "Lhabia", "Beauty School", and "Hexagram" for the first time since 2018.
text: Deftones headlines their Dia De Los Deftones festival on Saturday, November 3 and the setlist had some pretty cool choices! Deftones finally debuted their cover of Japan's "Ghosts" – originally a bonus track from 2010's Diamond Eyes – as well as played "Lhabia", "Beauty School", and "Hexagram" for the first time since 2018. The full setlist was: Be Quiet and Drive (Far Away) My Own Summer (Shove It) Lhabia (first time since 2018) Tempest Swerve City Beware Beauty School (first time since 2018) Diamond Eyes Rx Queen Rapture Ghosts (Japan cover) (live debut) 976-EVIL Hexagram (first time since 2018) Rosemary Headup Around the Fur Rickets (first time since 2019) Change (In the House of Flies) Genesis 7 Words Deftones will hit the road starting late next February for a North American tour featuring The Mars Volta and Fleshwater. Tickets are available here. And while Deftones hasn't given a concrete answer on when their new album is coming, it's definitely coming. 2/25 Portland, OR Moda Center2/27 Seattle, WA Climate Pledge Arena3/1 Sacramento, CA Golden 1 Center3/4 San Francisco, CA Chase Center3/5 Inglewood, CA Kia Forum3/6 Inglewood, CA Kia Forum3/8 Las Vegas, NV MGM Grand Garden Arena3/9 Phoenix, AZ Footprint Center3/12 Austin, TX Moody Center3/13 San Antonio, TX Frost Bank Center3/15 Dallas, TX American Airlines Center3/16 Houston, TX Toyota Center3/18 Atlanta, GA State Farm Arena3/20 Orlando, FL Kia Center3/22 Sunrise, FL Amerant Bank Arena3/24 Charlotte, NC Spectrum Center3/26 Nashville, TN Bridgestone Arena3/28 Indianapolis, IN Gainbridge Fieldhouse3/29 Columbus, OH Nationwide Arena3/31 Chicago, IL United Center4/1 Detroit, MI Little Caesars Arena4/3 New York, NY Madison Square Garden4/4 Philadelphia, PA Wells Fargo Center4/6 Washington, DC Capital One Arena4/8 Boston, MA TD Garden4/9 Newark, NJ Prudential Center Want More Metal? html:
Deftones headlines their Dia De Los Deftones festival on Saturday, November 3 and the setlist had some pretty cool choices! Deftones finally debuted their cover of Japan's "Ghosts" – originally a bonus track from 2010's Diamond Eyes – as well as played "Lhabia", "Beauty School", and "Hexagram" for the first time since 2018. The full setlist was:

  1. Be Quiet and Drive (Far Away)
  2. My Own Summer (Shove It)
  3. Lhabia (first time since 2018)
  4. Tempest
  5. Swerve City
  6. Beware
  7. Beauty School (first time since 2018)
  8. Diamond Eyes
  9. Rx Queen
  10. Rapture
  11. Ghosts (Japan cover) (live debut)
  12. 976-EVIL
  13. Hexagram (first time since 2018)
  14. Rosemary
  15. Headup
  16. Around the Fur
  17. Rickets (first time since 2019)
  18. Change (In the House of Flies)
  19. Genesis
  20. 7 Words

Deftones will hit the road starting late next February for a North American tour featuring The Mars Volta and Fleshwater. Tickets are available here. And while Deftones hasn't given a concrete answer on when their new album is coming, it's definitely coming.
